title: [RESOLVED] 2016-09-01 - Connection Issues
body:
We're aware of an issue that is causing players using some ISPs to be disconnected from their games. We are currently investigating at the moment.

**Updates:**
**3:35pm AEST** - This issue appears to have occured due to a third-party hardware failure in a link that some ISPs use to connect to our servers.  This connection has now recovered, and the issue should be resolved.

replies.body: Played a ranked game with a friend just before. mostly everyone from the game dc'ed. had to reconnect to the game manually. by leaving and reconnecting. My isp is spark, if the helps at all. Ranked is now down.
